messages.subject: Book Sale: 50% Off - Ending
messages.msgSnippet: I m ending my 50% off book sale in about 24 hours, midnight Monday local time in Chicago (UTC -6). Please see my earlier posting for details and limitations on
messages.messageBody:
I'm ending my 50% off book sale in about 24 hours, midnight Monday local
time in Chicago (UTC -6). Please see my earlier posting for details and
limitations on consigned books.

No, I didn't win the lottery, no rich uncle died. It just seems that
interest has tapered off. I do want to thank all of you who have been
supportive (and got some great deals!)

As stated before, I have no other job than being a bookseller, and I will
continue to do that, and offer specials on select books, and the occasional
update when I list something that I think is worth noting for collectors, if
only for information purposes. I will describe my stock as accurately as
possible, price fairly, and ship promptly packed for safe transit.

My last collection of tsuba is still for sale on Boris Markhasin's website,
[url]www.yamabushiantiques.com[/url], on the consignment page. The prices
shown were recently reduced from those that were listed in 2009.

Thanks,

Craig

--
Craig Harris
Bridge of Dreams, LLC
Books from and about Asia
www.bridgeofdreams.com
Member, IOBA, Independent Online Booksellers Association
Member, MWABA, Midwest Antiquarian Booksellers Association


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
